title: 8046 - BMF Long Sleeves
description:
MATERIAL: 100% Cotton.

FABRIC WEIGHT: 270 GSM.

FIT: Loose.

DESIGN: Own the look with these rugged, loose-fitting long sleeves. Crafted from durable 270 GSM, 100% cotton fabric, these tees bring serious attitude. The front and sleeves are decked out with aggressive, in-your-face graphics, making this shirt an unapologetic statement piece.

MODEL: The model in the first photo is wearing a size XL. Weight: 195lb Height: 5'10.
